alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 12:50PM EDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Brule River near Commonwealth affecting Dickinson, Forest, Florence and Iron Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Brule River near Commonwealth. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding is mainly confined to wooded lowland areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
